content.prompt: In the context of the passage, all of the following phrases refer to the same idea EXCEPT

choices.label: “the only means we consider open to voteless persons” (paragraph 3, sentence 5)
“the proper and the constitutional and the practical way of getting their grievance removed” (paragraph 4, sentence 1)
“some of the antiquated means by which men in the past got their grievances remedied” (paragraph 5, sentence 3)

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how the organization of a text creates unity and coherence and reflects a line of reasoning.
